author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The legal debacle between celebrities Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively is far from over. At least, that’s what Justin Baldoni’s lawyer has to say, insisting that Blake Lively has not yet won and that she shouldn’t be celebrating this soon. A judge recently dismissed Baldoni’s $400 million defamation lawsuit that was made against Lively. As [...]

The post Justin Baldoni’s Lawyer Says Blake Lively Hasn’t Won Just Yet appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Justin Baldoni’s Lawyer Says Blake Lively Hasn’t Won Just Yet

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
James Gunn, the current co-head of DC Studios, got his superhero start in the Marvel Cinematic Universe after directing the Guardians of the Galaxy trilogy. It took quite some time for the third film to get off the ground, however, but Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 was finally released in 2023. During the film’s [...]

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The 1978 novel The Stand from legendary author Stephen King is set to receive its first feature film adaptation. The iconic book, republished as “The Complete & Uncut Edition” in 1990, was previously adapted as a live-action miniseries in 1994 and again in 2020. Now The Stand is set to receive the feature film treatment [...]

The post Doug Liman To Direct Feature Film For Stephen King’s ‘The Stand’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Doug Liman To Direct Feature Film For Stephen King’s ‘The Stand’

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Warner Bros. Discovery currently has several continuities at play all based on DC Comics. This includes the larger DC Universe launched by DC Studios as well as Matt Reeves’ The Batman and its connected projects which were in the works prior to the DCU. Now DC Studios co-head James Gunn has said he’s open to [...]

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The cover of celebrity Sabrina Carpenter’s latest album, titled Man’s Best Friend, has officially dropped online. While fans of Carpenter are excited, others have been more critical, with some suggesting the album artwork is too sexual. Now Sabrina Carpenter is giving her response to the album cover backlash on social media. The response came as [...]

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Friday the 13th franchise is gradually coming back to life with the help of the all-new Jason Universe label. One of their upcoming projects is the new Crystal Lake TV series produced by A24 for release on the streaming service Peacock. Now, after years of development, Crystal Lake has finally started production. Brad Caleb [...]
